subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Ahhh the infamous Fish!
author: black bear hollow
full_text:
They're awful. I had a run in a few years ago. They are more than  
pranksters. Damn awful. Clever too.

w.

> Some seemed to be afraid of them, but I never really heard of them  
> doing anymore than being annoying and prankish and sometimes, well,  
> actually pretty damned funny on occasion.
>
>
> Ann
